name: Chekrut Gecko
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Chekrut" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated. You can banish this card from your GY and target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut Gecko" once per turn.
